#summary How to install the Eclipse Ganymede devolpment platform

= Introduction =

[http://www.eclipse.org/ Eclipse] is an open source community whose projects are focus on building an extensible development platform, runtimes and application frameworks for building, deploying and managing software across the entire software lifecycle.

= Details =

Installing eclipse Ganymede
 # Download _"Eclipse IDE for C/C++ Developers"_ from the eclipse website at http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/.
 # Extract the files from the archive into C:\.
 # Run the Eclipse executable from the folder and when asked for a workspace set it to C:\eclipse\workspace.


Configuring Eclipse for Tonatiuh
 # You can edit the general project options in Eclipse by navigating Window->Preferences->General.  Under File Associations add the new types
  * .ui  C:\msys\usr\qt\bin\designer
  * .ts  C:\msys\usr\qt\bin\linguist
 # In C\C++->Make->New Make Project 
  * Under the Make Builder tab set the build command to C:\MinGW\bin\mingw32-make.exe
  * Under Binary Parser select only PE Windows Parser
